main event: A round bright white object with a reddish tail was observed in the sky for 5 minutes.
interesting points: The object was the size of a dime,It was observed moving from west to northeast,The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes,The document concluded that it was probably an aircraft,The sighting occurred on 15 February 1957.
sighted object: one round bright white object with a reddish tail
